Awesome  Mexican gastronomíe.  Service is great.  Don't come if you are starving but if you want a great experience in Barcelona and enjoy Mexican themed food,  this is the place.  The guacamole is not traditional but delightful.  Sopes are not your traditional but the Chile poblano infused Masa was outstanding.  The dessert! Maiz con chocolate y caleta.  Amazing . but the corn cob in dessert is not actually corn!  It's ice cream shaped like corn and tastes like corn.  The caramel and truffles add so much flavor it was to die for.
